description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fiv7q","text":"InvitrogenTM TRIzolTM Plus RNA Purification Kit provides a simple, reliable, and rapid method for isolating high-quality total RNA from a wide variety of samples, including animal and plant cells and tissue, bacteria, and yeast.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5b7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kcr2","text":"This protocol was used to isolate RNA from liver tissue for BulkRNA sequencing in collaboration with The University of Minnesota Genomics Center. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b69kb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3355t","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"75CF2501EB9711EE82B00A58A9FEAC02","id":455519,"original_name":"TFS-Assets-LSG-manuals-Trizol_Plus_man.pdf","placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/pdf.png","raw_source":"","size":200837,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/p649b8u6f.pdf"}}}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aiqdi","text":"a. Lyse and homogenize samples in TRIzol Reagent by adding 1mL TRIzol reagent per 50-100mg tissue to the sample and use a homogenizer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gcu1","text":"b. Incubate for 5 minutes to permit complete dissociate of the nucleoproteins complex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4f5o6","text":"c. Add 0.2mL of chloroform per 1mL TRIzol Reagent used for lysis, then securely cap the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fi0c","text":"d. Incubate for 2-3 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f9uf","text":"e. Centrifuge the sample for 15 minutes at   at  - the mixture separates into a lower red phenol-chloroform, interphase and a colorless upper aqueous phase. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d546b","text":"f. Transfer ~600 μL of the colorless upper phase containing the RNA to a new tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bah7e","text":"g. Add an equal volume of 70% ethanol, then mix well by vortexing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50vdc","text":"h. Invert the tube to disperse any visible precipitate that may form after adding ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jspg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8be27","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpr8f","text":"a. Transfer up to 700 μL of the sample to a spin cartridge with (collection tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gdkn","text":"b. Centrifuge   for 15 seconds. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cs3bp","text":"c. Discard the flow through, then reinsert the spin cartridge into the same collection tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pted","text":"d. Repeat step 2a -step 2c until the entire sample has been processed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63lhn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mm13","text":"a. Add 700 μL of Wash Buffer I to the spin cartridge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f0ag","text":"b. Centrifuge at   for 15 seconds. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e48ru","text":"c. Discard the flow-through, then reinsert the spin cartridge into the same collection tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amb7m","text":"d. Add 500 μL of Wash Buffer II to the spin cartridge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8musf","text":"e. Centrifuge at   for 15 seconds. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"au3jo","text":"f. Discard the flow-through, then reinsert the spin cartridge into the same collection tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eic3n","text":"g. Repeat step 3d-3f once. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1saq","text":"a. Centrifuge at    for 1 minute to dry the membrane.
b. Discard the collection tube, then insert the spin cartridge into a recovery tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eo64t","text":"c. Add 30 μL-3 × 100 μL (3 sequential elutions with 100 μL each) of RNase-free water to the center of the spin cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lt9k","text":"- Note: If you are performing sequential elutions, collect all eluates in the same tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49d73","text":"d. Incubate for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84svb","text":"e. Centrifuge at >12,000 × g for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h469","text":"f. Discard the spin cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7iqbm","text":"The recovery tube contains the purified total RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h15b","text":"Store the purified RNA on ice if used within a few hours. For long-term storage, store the purified RNA
at –80°C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bje5","text":"If highly pure RNA without genomic DNA contamination is required, perform DNase I treatment after
purification (see PureLinkTM RNA Mini Kit User Guide (Pub. No. MAN0000406).
","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
